SEARCH
Package careerhub.models

Class Application

java.lang.Object
careerhub.models.Application
public class Application extends Object
Represents an application submitted by a student for a specific internship opportunity. Each application tracks the student ID, internship ID, and current status, which evolves as Company Representatives and Career Center Staff review and process the request.

This class also manages special state transitions such as withdrawal requests and student confirmation after a successful offer. These transitions must comply with assignment rules: students may withdraw only under certain statuses, and confirmation is only valid after an application becomes "SUCCESSFUL".

  • Constructor Details

    • Application

      public Application(String id, String internshipId, String studentId)
      Constructs a new Application object with an initial status of PENDING.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier for the application
      internshipId - the ID of the internship opportunity being applied to
      studentId - the ID of the student submitting the application

  • Method Details

    • getId

      public String getId()
      Retrieves the unique application ID.
      Returns:
      the application ID

    • getInternshipId

      public String getInternshipId()
      Retrieves the internship ID associated with this application.
      Returns:
      the internship ID

    • getStudentId

      public String getStudentId()
      Retrieves the ID of the student who submitted this application.
      Returns:
      the student ID

    • getStatusEnum

      public ApplicationStatus getStatusEnum()
      Retrieves the current application status as an enum value.
      Returns:
      the ApplicationStatus enum representing the current state

    • getStatus

      public String getStatus()
      Retrieves the application status as a String. This is used when printing or comparing status text in menus or persistent storage.
      Returns:
      the status name (e.g. "PENDING", "SUCCESSFUL")

    • updateStatus

      public void updateStatus(ApplicationStatus newStatus)
      Updates the application status using an enum value. This is typically used by Company Representatives or Career Center Staff during the approval and review process.
      Parameters:
      newStatus - the new application status to assign

    • setStatus

      public void setStatus(String newStatus)
      Updates the application status using a textual value. Commonly used by DataManager when reading or interpreting text-based decisions. The input is case-insensitive and trimmed before processing.

      If the provided text is invalid and does not match any enum value, the current status remains unchanged.

      Parameters:
      newStatus - the status text to parse and apply

    • requestWithdrawal

      public boolean requestWithdrawal()
      Initiates a withdrawal request for the application. A withdrawal may only be requested when the application is currently in PENDING or SUCCESSFUL status. The request will later be processed by Career Center Staff.
      Returns:
      true if a withdrawal request was successfully initiated; false if withdrawal is not allowed in the current status

    • withdraw

      public boolean withdraw()
      Alias for requestWithdrawal() kept for backward compatibility with older parts of the system that may still call withdraw().
      Returns:
      true if a withdrawal request was successfully initiated; false otherwise

    • isWithdrawalRequested

      public boolean isWithdrawalRequested()
      Checks whether the application is currently in the WITHDRAW_REQUESTED state. Used to list pending withdrawal requests that require Career Center Staff approval.
      Returns:
      true if a withdrawal request has been submitted; false otherwise

    • confirmByStudent

      public void confirmByStudent()
      Marks the application as confirmed by the student. Confirmation is only valid if the application is in the SUCCESSFUL state, which represents an accepted offer. This method does nothing if the application is not successful.

    • isConfirmedByStudent

      public boolean isConfirmedByStudent()
      Checks whether the student has confirmed (accepted) this internship placement.
      Returns:
      true if the student has accepted the offer; false otherwise
